name: Bell Master
description:
Your marriage is a mess.

Luckily, after yet another fight with your wife, you meet a strange old man in the park. He offers to teach you what he knows about classical conditioning to help you get your marriage back on track.

Using Pavlov's bell, help bring out your wife's sexuality. Reduce the stress in your lives, and rekindle your relationship. Do you want a loving wife or a devoted slave? The choice is yours.
